subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: In 1999, another lockout-shortened season, the Knicks were an eighth seed that upset a No. 1. The Knicks made it to the finals that year. Philadelphia has a chance to do the same.
snippet: In 1999, another lockout-shortened season, the Knicks were an eighth seed that upset a No. 1. The Knicks made it to the finals that year. Philadelphia has a chance to do the same.
